Boston police officers got OT pay for work unbidden

A Globe analysis found that Boston police earned more than 400 hours of overtime pay for court appearances not requested by the District Attorney's office. (Globe)
  • 2/10: Boston police are Hub’s top wage earners
  • job doc When is a worker entitled to OT pay?

Lynn man fatally shot by police

Officials said Brandon Payne was shot by police after the car he was in allegedly hit a police vehicle. Payne was hospitalized and later died, officials said. (Globe, 8:22 a.m.)
pictures

Colorado begins to heal after shooting

State residents are mourning the lives lost in a variety of ways, including one man who made 12 crosses for each of the victims killed in last week's theater shooting.

Local wind, solar subsidy set for review

Those who connect solar panels and wind turbines to the area's power grid receive a little-known subsidy, with other utility customers footing the bill. (Boston Globe)

News

82 killed in Iraq's
deadliest day this year

An onslaught of bombings and shootings killed 82 people in 12 Iraqi cities and towns today. The violence appeared to be coordinated, taking place within a few hours of each other.
